base.description:
The background colors will be use in large regions of layout and not for component backgrounds. 

â€¢ Used as the base layer background.

layer-1.description:
Use on large regions of layout and not for component backgrounds. 

Use as the second layer, on top of Base Background

layer-2.description:
Use ion large regions of layout and not for component backgrounds. 

Use as the third layer, on top of Layer 1 Background

static-black.description:
Use in large regions of layout and not for component backgrounds. 

Use on elements that don't change color on dark or dark themes

static-white.description:
Use in large regions of layout and not for component backgrounds. 

Use on elements that don't change color on dark or dark themes

primary.description: Used as primary text like titles

subtle.description: Used as a subtle text color like on body text

inverse-subtle.description: Used as a subtle text color like on body text on color

subtle.description: Used as a subtle icon color

disabled.description: Use for Background and Borders on a disable state.

enabled.description: Use on accent elements such as backgrounds and borders

hovered.description: Use on accent elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on hover state.

pressed.description: Use on accent elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on press state.

focused.description:
Use on accent elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on focus state.

Accompanied by a focus border: 2px of space between the edge of the component and a black or white border.

dragged.description: Use on accent elements such as backgrounds and borders, when they are on drag state.

Accompanied by a focus border: 2px of space between the edge of the component and a black or white border.

disabled.description: Use on accent content such as text or icon when they are on disable state.

on-solid.description: Use on accent content such as text or icon when they are on solid color.

on-transparent.description: Use on accent content such as text or icon when they are on transparent color.
